Choe Thae Bok Meets Russian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a conversation with Russian Ambassador Andrei Karlov who paid a farewell call on him Wednesday. 
 Present there were Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and Alexander Matsegora, minister councillor of the Russian embassy here.
